DescriptionData.Title: Three Minute Cheek Art - Mandella
DescriptionData.Description: Roberta Mandella's "Three Minute Cheek Art" book is a thrilling book of face painting designs. And ones that take only 3 minutes to complete with practice. "3-Minute Cheek Art" includes step-by-step instructions plus over 150 photo ideas. Flip through this book and get inspired for your next face painting gig. There are varieties of face painting cheek art designs: teddy bear, stegosaurus, snakes, lizards, dinosaurs, flames, train, race car, rocket, flowers, unicorn, butterfly, bugs, panda, cat, bulldog, turtle, hearts and many more face painting cheek designs that you can do in 3 minutes. Three Minute Cheek Art Mandella book is pamphlet size 56 pages paperback face paint book. A greaty book for the face painter just starting out.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Keep the long line of children moving with 3 minute designs
Perfect for the beginner face painter
Snakes to teddy bears, flames, trains and automobiles and much more
